definition: to refuse to take a passenger (of taxi)
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: In Xining City, the capital of Qinghai Province, some taxi drivers have started to refuse to take Tibetan passengers.
sentences.chinese: 在青海省省府西宁市，已有部分出租车拒载藏人。

sentences.english: What kind of bus driver refuses to take passengers?
sentences.chinese: 一个多么恶劣的公交司机，他可以拒载乘客？

definition: person who joins with others to reduce costs (carpooling, group buying, sharing an apartment etc)
unlicensed or unofficial taxi/unlicensed motor vehicle
to run the meter (in a taxi)
to solicit (guests, clients, passengers etc)/to importune
to run a red light/failing to stop at a red traffic light/(slang) to have sex with a girl while she is menstruating
to call a cab (by phone)/to request a ride (via an app)
